posts.post_content:
Hello,
I'm looking to buy a N28 Ward and N28 Cody graded somewhere in the 3-5 range. SGC is STRONGLY preferred but will consider PSA or raw. 
David

A card I tried crossing did not come back with favorable results and I am desperate for a N28 Ward to complete my SGC set. Looking for in the 40-60 range. PLEASE HELP!
David
My (almost) complete set, the Cody is due back tomorrow. 
[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=5&set=256&userset=5125[/url]

hello David,

I sent you a PM about N28s...not sure if you got it, but I gave up on the set several years ago and have about half the set in fairly high grade if you'd be interested in upgrading any of yours.

Also, for the right trade bait (don't want $$$$), I'd consider trading the Ward. Heres a scan.

[IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/55%20card%20baseball%20collection/n28_ward902.jpg[/IMG]

regards, Keith O'Leary
